vodsystemfx.classes

Class Product

  • java.lang.Object
    • vodsystemfx.classes.Product
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Movie, Season, Series, Stream

    public class Product
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Products are added to system by distributors or by system administrator. Every product has photo of application sponsor. Products can be viewed after purchasing. It has also line chart of views generated by users. Types of products are Movie, Series and Stream
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
